title.rendered: Intellectsoft Wins Stevie Award for EuroAccident App

content.rendered:
Intellectsoft is pleased to win a Stevie Award in the category “New Service or Product” for the insurance industry. Stevie is one of the most coveted business prizes. It is aimed to honor and bring to public’s attention the positive contributions of organizations and professionals around the world since 2002.

The solution that has brought us the award is a mobile app for an established Swedish insurance services provider EuroAccident. A NASDAQ-listed company that has been operating since 1996, EuroAccident offers an extensive range of health insurance options and health services to Swedish companies, to help them succeed with their health and work environment strategies.

Our mobile solution helped EuroAccident perform a digital transformation of the company’s services.  

The app simplifies a wide range of activities, from viewing request history to comprehensive appointment management of multiple procedures, with scheduling, reminders, map, and other. It is also a scalable solution that safeguards the data of all parties involved in EuroAccident’s insurance process.

As a result, the app has allowed the company to strengthen the relationships with their customers and partners, as well as set the bar for providing digital insurance services in Europe

“Intellectsoft managed their team well and made sure we understood what was being worked on,” said Henrik Andersson, project manager at EuroAccident. “We’re currently planning the next version of the app, which will have more features and functionalities.” You can also see the full review on Clutch.

Intellectsoft has been developing impactful and award-winning apps for Fortune 500 companies and established brands for over a decade. We delivered solutions to Eurostar, Jaguar Land Rover, Universal, EY, Guinness, and other enterprises.

Learn more about the cases in our Case Studies section.
